channel.title: VPS error
channel.description:
Ok guys, im back..
We had the server up and running, but then when we tried to update server, we cant host it again. Can someone help?

item.title: VPS error
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

As you are right, You can still atleast be here to help NO OFFENCE but this is Server HELP, And techinecily a VPS is a server and does function with the server and it says vps ERROR not need a host\programmer.

Edit: Sorry bro I dont know anything about Linux but I saw a clippet for setting one up for it ill try to find it for you.

Edit2: Try this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367407.0.html

item.title: VPS error
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Rule 1:

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS error
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

What VPS do you got? Like Windows , Linux? And if windows, Witch is needed for most servers unless using tutorial for a remake of the Run.bat you will need to go download Java-JRE and then set ur environment varibles witch are located by hiting the start button and then right clicking on computer, then hiting properties,Advanced,Environment varibles and then find path and have that open then hit computer again then Program files (IF 32bit) or Program Files (x86) (IF 64bit), Then go to java,JRE and copy the top link were it says c:\bla bla and paste it in path were it starts.

Read full topic
